duas.arabic: اللهم أذهب غيض قلبي
duas.transliteration: Allahumma azhib gaydha qalbee
duas.translation: Oh Allah, remove anger from my heart

duas.arabic: أعوذ بالله من الشيطان الرجيم
duas.transliteration: Aʿūdhu billāhi min ash-shayṭān ar-rajīm
duas.translation: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan

quranic_verse.translation: Those who restrain their anger and pardon others, Allah loves those who do good.

emotions.note: Reflect on patience and forgiveness, as exemplified by the Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ).

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min-l-hammi wa-l-ḥazan
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your protection from anxiety and grief

duas.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ
duas.transliteration: Ḥasbiyallāhu lā ilāha illā huwa ʿalayhi tawakkaltu
duas.translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no deity except Him; upon Him I rely

quranic_verse.translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

emotions.note: Trust in Allah’s promise of relief after difficulty.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min al-ʿajz wa-l-kasal
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness

quranic_verse.translation: And We have certainly created man in hardship.

emotions.note: Engage in dhikr or productive acts to combat boredom.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min zawāli niʿmatika
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the disappearance of Your blessings

quranic_verse.translation: And He found you lost and guided [you].

emotions.note: Express gratitude for Allah’s guidance and blessings.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma yā muqallib al-qulūb, thabbit qalbī ʿalā dīnik
duas.translation: O Allah, Turner of hearts, make my heart firm upon Your religion

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اكْشِفْ عَنِّي كُلَّ بَلَاءٍ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ikshif ʿannī kulla balāʾ
duas.translation: O Allah, remove from me all affliction

quranic_verse.translation: He it is Who has sent down to you the Book; in it are verses clear [muḥkamāt]...

emotions.note: Seek clarity through istikhara (prayer for guidance).

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ قَنِّنِي بِمَا رَزَقْتَنِي
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma qannīnī bimā razaqtanī
duas.translation: O Allah, make me content with what You have provided me

quranic_verse.translation: And Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him.

emotions.note: Contentment comes from gratitude and trust in Allah’s decree.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min-l-hammi wa-l-ḥazan
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your protection from anxiety and grief

quranic_verse.translation: So do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior if you are [true] believers.

emotions.note: Combine dua with small acts of worship and professional support if needed.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الشَّكِّ وَالشِّرْكِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min ash-shakk wa-sh-shirk
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from doubt and associating partners with You

quranic_verse.translation: Say, ‘He is Allah, [who is] One.’

emotions.note: Strengthen faith through learning and supplication.

duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَنْعَمَ عَلَيْنَا
duas.transliteration: Alḥamdulillāh alladhī anʿama ʿalaynā
duas.translation: All praise is due to Allah who has bestowed favors upon us

quranic_verse.translation: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them.

emotions.note: Express gratitude through daily dhikr and charity.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبُخْلِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min al-bukhl
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from miserliness

quranic_verse.translation: And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul—it is those who will be successful.

emotions.note: Practice generosity to counter greed.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma ighfir lī dhanbī kullahu
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins

quranic_verse.translation: And those who, when they commit an immorality or wrong themselves, remember Allah and seek forgiveness...

emotions.note: Repentance (tawbah) is key to alleviating guilt.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min zawāli niʿmatika
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the disappearance of Your blessings

quranic_verse.translation: Say, ‘In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy—therein let them rejoice...’

emotions.note: Share happiness through acts of kindness.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min-l-hammi wa-l-ḥazan
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your protection from anxiety and grief

quranic_verse.translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

emotions.note: Reflect on the Prophet’s (ﷺ) patience during trials.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ طَهِّرْ قَلْبِي مِنَ النِّفَاقِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma tahhir qalbī min an-nifāq
duas.translation: O Allah, purify my heart from hypocrisy

quranic_verse.translation: O you who have believed, fear Allah and be with those who are true.

emotions.note: Seek sincerity through self-reflection and dua.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَخِيرُكَ بِعِلْمِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni astakhiruk biʿilmik
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your guidance through Your knowledge (Istikhara prayer)

quranic_verse.translation: And consult them in the matter...

emotions.note: Perform salat al-istikhara for decision-making.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَا تَجْعَلْ فِي قَلْبِي كَرَاهِيَّةً لِأَحَدٍ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma la tajʿal fī qalbī karāhiyyah li-aḥad
duas.translation: O Allah, do not place in my heart hatred for anyone

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ نَقِّ قَلْبِي مِنَ الْحَسَدِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma naqqi qalbī min al-ḥasad
duas.translation: O Allah, purify my heart from envy

quranic_verse.translation: And [there is a share for] those who came after them, saying, ‘Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers...’

emotions.note: Counter jealousy with dua for others’ blessings.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min al-ʿajz wa-l-kasal
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness

quranic_verse.translation: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives.

emotions.note: Set small goals to overcome laziness.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ ارْزُقْنِي حُبَّكَ وَحُبَّ مَا يَنْفَعُنِي حُبُّهُ عِنْدَكَ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-r-zuqnī ḥubbak, wa ḥubba ma-y-yanfaʿunī ḥubbuhu ʿindak
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me Your love and the love of those whose love benefits me with You

quranic_verse.translation: And He is with you wherever you are.

emotions.note: Find comfort in Allah’s constant presence.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اهْدِنِي لِلصِّرَاطِ الْمُسْتَقِيمِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma ihdinī li-ṣ-ṣirāṭ al-mustaqīm
duas.translation: O Allah, guide me to the straight path

quranic_verse.translation: Guide us to the straight path.

emotions.note: Seek guidance through Quran and dua.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min-l-hammi wa-l-ḥazan
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your protection from anxiety and grief

quranic_verse.translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

emotions.note: Practice deep breathing and dhikr for calm.

duas.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ
duas.transliteration: Ḥasbiyallāhu lā ilāha illā huwa ʿalayhi tawakkaltu
duas.translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no deity except Him; upon Him I rely

quranic_verse.translation: So do not weaken and do not grieve...

emotions.note: Delegate tasks and rely on Allah.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma ighfir lī dhanbī kullahu
duas.translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins

quranic_verse.translation: And those who, when they commit an immorality or wrong themselves, remember Allah...

emotions.note: Repent sincerely and resolve to improve.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min-l-hammi wa-l-ḥazan
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your protection from anxiety and grief

quranic_verse.translation: Rabbi innī limā anzalta illayya min khayrin faqīr (My Lord, truly I am in dire need of any good You send me).

emotions.note: Recite Surah Ad-Duha for comfort.

duas.arabic: رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِينِ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti-sh-shayāṭīn
duas.translation: My Lord, I seek protection with You from the promptings of the devils

quranic_verse.translation: Say, ‘My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils.’

emotions.note: Increase dhikr to dispel fear.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min-l-hammi wa-l-ḥazan
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your protection from anxiety and grief

quranic_verse.translation: And do not kill yourselves. Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.

emotions.note: Seek immediate professional help alongside spiritual support.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min al-ʿajz wa-l-kasal
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness

quranic_verse.translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

emotions.note: Rest and rejuvenate through worship and self-care.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ ارْزُقْنِي حُبَّكَ وَحُبَّ مَا يَنْفَعُنِي حُبُّهُ عِنْدَكَ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-r-zuqnī ḥubbak, wa ḥubba ma-y-yanfaʿunī ḥubbuhu ʿindak
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me Your love and the love of those whose love benefits me with You

quranic_verse.translation: And He is with you wherever you are.

emotions.note: Seek Allah’s love to fill the void.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min al-ʿajz wa-l-kasal
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness

quranic_verse.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear...

emotions.note: Rely on Allah’s strength to overcome weakness.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَافِيَةَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni asʾaluk al-ʿāfiyah
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being

quranic_verse.translation: And your Lord says, ‘Call upon Me; I will respond to you.’

emotions.note: Trust in Allah’s timing and plan.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الدُّنْيَا
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min fitnat ad-dunyā
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the trials of this world

quranic_verse.translation: And lower your gaze and guard your chastity...

emotions.note: Seek modesty and self-control through dua.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
duas.transliteration: Allahumma zidnī ʿilman
duas.translation: O Allah, increase me in knowledge

quranic_verse.translation: Say, ‘My Lord, increase me in knowledge.’

emotions.note: Channel curiosity into learning about faith.

duas.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ
duas.transliteration: Ḥasbiyallāhu lā ilāha illā huwa ʿalayhi tawakkaltu
duas.translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no deity except Him; upon Him I rely

quranic_verse.translation: So do not weaken and do not grieve...

emotions.note: Find strength in reliance on Allah.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الدُّنْيَا
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min fitnat ad-dunyā
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the trials of this world

quranic_verse.translation: Beautified for people is the love of that which they desire...

emotions.note: Seek lawful fulfillment of desires.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min-l-hammi wa-l-ḥazan
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your protection from anxiety and grief

quranic_verse.translation: Is He [not best] who responds to the desperate one when he calls upon Him...

emotions.note: Call upon Allah in times of desperation.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الثَّبَاتَ فِي الْأَمْرِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni asʾaluk ath-thabāt fil-amr
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for steadfastness in affairs

quranic_verse.translation: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives.

emotions.note: Stay firm with dua and effort.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الشَّكِّ وَالشِّرْكِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni aʿūdhu bika min ash-shakk wa-sh-shirk
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from doubt and associating partners with You

quranic_verse.translation: Say, ‘He is Allah, [who is] One.’

emotions.note: Strengthen faith through Quran recitation.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَا تَجْعَلْ فِي قَلْبِي كَرَاهِيَّةً لِأَحَدٍ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma la tajʿal fī qalbī karāhiyyah li-aḥad
duas.translation: O Allah, do not place in my heart hatred for anyone

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ نَقِّ قَلْبِي مِنَ الْحَسَدِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma naqqi qalbī min al-ḥasad
duas.translation: O Allah, purify my heart from envy

quranic_verse.translation: And [there is a share for] those who came after them, saying, ‘Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers...’

emotions.note: Pray for others’ blessings to counter envy.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَا تَجْعَلْ فِي قَلْبِي كَرَاهِيَّةً لِأَحَدٍ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma la tajʿal fī qalbī karāhiyyah li-aḥad
duas.translation: O Allah, do not place in my heart hatred for anyone

quranic_verse.translation: And do not let the hatred of a people prevent you from being just...

emotions.note: Seek to replace hatred with forgiveness.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِزَّنِي بِالدِّينِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma aʿizzanī bid-dīn
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me honor through faith

quranic_verse.translation: To Allah belongs all honor...

emotions.note: Find dignity in submission to Allah.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الصَّبْرَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni asʾaluk as-ṣabr
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for patience

quranic_verse.translation: And be patient, for indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good.

emotions.note: Practice patience through dhikr.

duas.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ
duas.transliteration: Ḥasbiyallāhu lā ilāha illā huwa ʿalayhi tawakkaltu
duas.translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no deity except Him; upon Him I rely

quranic_verse.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear...

emotions.note: Trust in Allah’s plan for security.

duas.arabic: اللهم أذهب غيض قلبي
duas.transliteration: Allahumma azhib gaydha qalbee
duas.translation: Oh Allah, remove anger from my heart

quranic_verse.translation: Those who restrain their anger and pardon others...

emotions.note: Practice forgiveness to calm irritation.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ ارْزُقْنِي حُبَّكَ وَحُبَّ مَا يَنْفَعُنِي حُبُّهُ عِنْدَكَ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma-r-zuqnī ḥubbak, wa ḥubba ma-y-yanfaʿunī ḥubbuhu ʿindak
duas.translation: O Allah, grant me Your love and the love of those whose love benefits me with You

quranic_verse.translation: And among His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates...

emotions.note: Channel love toward Allah and lawful relationships.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَافِيَةَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni asʾaluk al-ʿāfiyah
duas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being

quranic_verse.translation: And remember Allah during [specific] numbered days...

emotions.note: Reflect on past blessings with gratitude.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَا تَجْعَلْ فِي قَلْبِي كَرَاهِيَّةً لِأَحَدٍ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma la tajʿal fī qalbī karāhiyyah li-aḥad
duas.translation: O Allah, do not place in my heart hatred for anyone

quranic_verse.translation: And do not let the hatred of a people prevent you from being just...

emotions.note: Respond with patience and justice.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ السَّلَامُ وَمِنْكَ السَّلَامُ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma antas-salām wa minkas-salām
duas.translation: O Allah, You are peace, and from You comes peace

quranic_verse.translation: Their greeting therein will be, ‘Peace!’

emotions.note: Maintain peace through dhikr and gratitude.

duas.arabic: اللهم أذهب غيض قلبي
duas.transliteration: Allahumma azhib gaydha qalbee
duas.translation: Oh Allah, remove anger from my heart

duas.arabic: أعوذ بالله من الشيطان الرجيم
duas.transliteration: Aʿūdhu billāhi min ash-shayṭān ar-rajīm
duas.translation: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan

quranic_verse.translation: Those who restrain their anger and pardon others...

emotions.note: Seek calm through dua and reflection.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ قَنِّنِي بِمَا رَزَقْتَنِي
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma qannīnī bimā razaqtanī
duas.translation: O Allah, make me content with what You have provided me

quranic_verse.translation: And Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him.

emotions.note: Express gratitude for Allah’s provisions.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma yā muqallib al-qulūb, thabbit qalbī ʿalā dīnik
duas.translation: O Allah, Turner of hearts, make my heart firm upon Your religion

quranic_verse.translation: And whoever believes in Allah—He will guide his heart...

emotions.note: Seek certainty through faith and istikhara.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ
duas.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min-l-hammi wa-l-ḥazan
duas.translation: O Allah, I seek Your protection from anxiety and grief

quranic_verse.translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

emotions.note: Find ease through trust in Allah.
